amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army", $3,000,000 for Medical Advanced Technology for the Intravenous Membrane Oxygenator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3501 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3501 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S7373; text: CR S7373) To make available, from amounts appropriated for "Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army", $3,000,000 for Medical Advanced Technology for the Intravenous Membrane Oxygenator.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3501 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3501 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum.
